message.body: Furious. Sean had his partner, Darlene (other Artistic Director and Choreographer of the show) call me back and tell me I have to perform tomorrow. He either didn't fill her in or told her to handle it - she said, "Well, you've have plenty of opportunities to say no to this before today and we've already agreed."
I really don't appreciate people making decisions against how I feel - telling me I have to perform when I've made it clear that I'm worried I'll hurt my voice if I do.
I know I signed a contract, but this isn't opening night, this isn't a show that reviewers are at, this isn't even a show!!! - this is a performance at a retirement home for publicity.
A short performance that an understudy is even attending!

That's so unfortunate. I'm sorry it happened like that, muff. You have to go, tho :/ You could talk to sean calmly n reach a compromise n mention that u wish he'd communicated openly with you about it. But stay calm, it's the best way to prove your point. Poor muffin!
Did you get there okay muffling?
Are the people nice to you!?!?
Lol sooo nice so far! I gooozed all over Kate about you! :D
Ahhhhhhhh haha - did she seem surprised?
Lol I think she knows you're good. She listened intently but I could tell u aren't buds ;)
